me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.scoreboard

Class ScoreboardEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.scoreboard.ScoreboardEntry

  • public final class ScoreboardEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an entry in a "scoreless" scoreboard. This class can also manipulate text cyclers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScoreboardEntry(ChatColor[] prefix, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a scoreboard entry with the specified textual value and mutliple color code prefix.
      ScoreboardEntry(ChatColor prefix, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a scoreboard entry with the specified textual value and color code prefix.
      ScoreboardEntry(java.lang.String value)
      Creates a scoreboard entry with the specified textual value.
      ScoreboardEntry(java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a scoreboard entry with the specified textual value and prefix.

    • Method Summary

        public ScoreboardEntry(ChatColor prefix,
               java.lang.String value)

        value - The textual value.

      • ScoreboardEntry

        public ScoreboardEntry(ChatColor[] prefix,
               java.lang.String value)
        Creates a scoreboard entry with the specified textual value and mutliple color code prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The color prefixes for the value, in order.
        value - The textual value.

      • ScoreboardEntry

        public ScoreboardEntry(java.lang.String prefix,
               java.lang.String value)
        Creates a scoreboard entry with the specified textual value and prefix.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The textual value prefix, such as a color.
        value - The textual value.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue()
        Get the text of the scoreboard entry.
        Returns:
        The untrimmed text of the scoreboard entry, excluding the prefix.

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Get the prefix of the scoreboard entry.
        Returns:
        The untrimmed prefix of the scoreboard entry, which may be blank if there is no prefix.

      • createCycler

        public TextCycler createCycler()
        Creates and returns a new text cycler, which cycles through this scoreboard manager entry text value.

        The returned text cycler will not have a prefix set. It is the responsibility of the scoreboard displayer to add the prefix, such as through a team.

        Returns:
        A new TextCycler instance, which cycles through scoreboard entry text.
